Class ParcelCSVFileReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • parcelhub.utilities.ParcelCSVFileReader
  • Deprecated. 
    use ParcelXMLFileReader

    public class ParcelCSVFileReader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class reads from our database file, one line at a time. Project: Parcel Hub Platform: jdk 1.8.0_14; NetBeans IDE 8.1; Windows 10 Course: CS 143 Created on May 2, 2016, 6:05:21 PM Revised on May 6, 2016, 1:44:33 PM

    • Method Detail

      • createReader

        private java.io.BufferedReader createReader()
        Deprecated. 
        Creates our file reader object and returns it to the constructor. Doing it in this way allows us to declare the reader as final.
        Returns:
        BufferedReader which will read our file at filePath.

      • getFileExists

        public boolean getFileExists()
        Deprecated. 
        Checks for the existence of our file at a given path.
        Returns:
        true if file exists.

      • readRecord

        public java.lang.String readRecord()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the next line of our file at filePath.
        Returns:
        String representation of a line in the file.

      • close

        public void close()
        Deprecated. 
        Closes our BufferedReader object. Forgetting this step may cause unexpected errors while trying to dynamically update our database.
